title: School’s AI system mistakes a bag of chips for a gun
snippet: “I don’t think a chip bag should be mistaken for a gun,” said the student, as eight police cars showed up to take down him and his Doritos.
reason: The news article describes a highly unusual and unexpected event that is both bizarre and entertaining. It involves an AI system mistaking a bag of chips for a gun at school, leading to the arrival of eight police cars. This kind of story has elements of humor and shock value while also touching on serious issues like overreactions by security systems.

title: Doritos and Cheetos Go Dye-Free With New Line of Snacks, and We Have Questions
snippet: The Simply NKD line of the beloved snacks will have no dyes or artificial flavors, but you can still buy the original eye-wateringly orange versions.

title: Anthropic's new warning: If you train AI to cheat, it'll hack and sabotage too

title: 'I compared Doritos tortilla chips to Tesco, Waitrose and ...
